concept.title: Pumpkin Pie
concept.shortdesc: This tutorial will show you how to create a pumpkin pie.

conbody.p: Pumpkin pie is likely the best pie for exactly two months out of the year: October and November. Though scholars debate the accuracy of this statement, it is our fervent belief that this is true.
To create a pumpkin pie, you will first make the crust, then the pie filling, and finally assemble and bake.
